event.title: 2001 Census, the population of the electoral ward of New Brighton stood

data.event: At the 2001 Census, the population of the electoral ward of New Brighton stood at 14,450 (6,869 males, 7,581 females), increasing at the 2011 Census to 14,859 (7,237 Males, 7,622 Females).
The Perch Rock battery was completed in 1829.
It mounted 18 guns, mostly 32 pounders, with 3 6-inch guns installed in 1899.

event.title: 1830, a Liverpool merchant, James Atherton, purchased

data.event: In 1830, a Liverpool merchant, James Atherton, purchased much of the land at Rock Point, which enjoyed views out to sea and across the Mersey and had a good beach.
